named-native-query.name: BSSIDdata.getNetworks
named-native-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(trim(wifiname), ' (', bssid, ')'), bssid FROM bssiddata WHERE accuracy<30 AND wifiname<>'' AND deviceid = ? ORDER BY 1

named-query.name: BSSIDdata.getDataByBssidAndDevice
named-query.query: SELECT b from BSSIDdata b WHERE b.bssid = :bssid AND b.deviceId = :deviceId AND b.accuracy<30

named-query.name: Configuration.listDevices
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Configuration c WHERE c.key = :ckey

named-query.name: Configuration.listConfigByDeviceId
named-query.description: List all configuration records by device ID
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Configuration c WHERE c.deviceId = :deviceId

named-query.name: Configuration.getSafeWifiConfig
named-query.description: Finds Wifi configuration for the device
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Configuration c WHERE c.key = :ckey AND c.deviceId = :deviceId

named-query.name: LogFile.listByDevice
named-query.description: List log files for particular device
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM LogFile m WHERE m.deviceId = :deviceId ORDER BY m.id DESC

named-query.name: MLSData.listLastMLSPointsByDeviceId
named-query.description: Lists 2 last points to check distance (should we report the change)
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM MLSData m WHERE m.deviceId = :deviceId ORDER BY m.inserted DESC

named-query.name: GPSData.findLastNonSafe
named-query.description: Finds non-safe GPS coordinates for device ("LIMIT 1" or whatever, will be added in code)
named-query.query: SELECT g FROM GPSData g WHERE g.deviceId = :deviceId AND g.safeNetwork = :safenetwork AND g.latitude != :latfilter AND g.accuracy <= :accuracy ORDER BY g.id DESC

named-query.name: GPSData.findLastNonSafeAfterReported
named-query.description: Finds non-safe GPS coordinates for device AFTER mentioned point ("LIMIT 1" or whatever, will be added in code)
named-query.query: SELECT g FROM GPSData g WHERE g.deviceId = :deviceId AND g.safeNetwork = :safenetwork AND g.latitude != :latfilter AND g.accuracy <= :accuracy AND g.id > :lastId ORDER BY g.id DESC

named-query.name: GPSData.listLastRecordsByDevice
named-query.description: Lists last saved GPS reports by device, ordered by timestamp DESC
named-query.query: SELECT g FROM GPSData g WHERE g.deviceId = :deviceId ORDER BY g.inserted desc

named-native-query.name: GPSData.listStatistics
named-native-query.description: Getting statistics data of Wifi networks and GPS coordinates
named-native-query.query: SELECT g1.* FROM gpsdata g1 INNER JOIN (SELECT max(inserted) as MaxPostDate, latitude, longitude FROM gpsdata GROUP BY concat (latitude, longitude)) g2 ON g1.latitude = g2.latitude AND g1.inserted = g2.MaxPostDate WHERE day(g1.inserted)=day(NOW()) AND g1.deviceid = ? AND g1.accuracy>0 ORDER BY g1.inserted desc LIMIT ?

named-native-query.name: GPSData.listStatisticsDEBUG
named-native-query.description: Getting statistics data of Wifi networks and GPS coordinates
named-native-query.query: SELECT g1.* FROM gpsdata g1 INNER JOIN (SELECT max(inserted) as MaxPostDate, latitude, longitude FROM gpsdata GROUP BY concat (latitude, longitude)) g2 ON g1.latitude = g2.latitude AND g1.inserted = g2.MaxPostDate WHERE g1.deviceid = ? AND g1.accuracy>0 ORDER BY g1.inserted desc LIMIT ?

named-native-query.name: State.cleanupLastReportedGPSPoint
named-native-query.query: DELETE FROM state WHERE deviceid = ? AND ckey = 'LAST_REPORTED_GPS_POINT'

named-query.name: State.findByDeviceAndKey
named-query.description: Finds the State by passed params
named-query.query: SELECT s from State s WHERE s.deviceId = :deviceId AND s.key = :ckey

named-query.name: State.listByKey
named-query.query: SELECT s from State s WHERE s.key = :ckey

named-query.name: State.deleteByDeviceAndKey
named-query.query: DELETE from State c WHERE c.deviceId = :deviceId AND c.key = :ckey
